[DQC.US.0009.46] The value of Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Benefit Obligation, 176,000,000, should be less than or equal to Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, 175,000,000. Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Benefit Obligation must be less than or equal to Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, as it does not include assumptions about future compensation levels.
